column4: the fact is, macromedia don't provide a linux version of their shockwave player.
see - the linker doesn't know where to find the libraries on hoary either unless I tell it
for - oh I give up.  Damned beer!
I've been to see Avril Lavigne in concert tonight.  It was pretty dire, so I got drunk instead.
- I find it difficult to tel the difference sometimes
if you find out, please let me know how.  I hate it too.
how much lag?  Is it a 3 second lag that happens some times but not other times?
did you run 'top' and check if anything is hogging the CPU?
that would probably make it run faster
the 'handwriting' feature in MSN7 is nice
nudges and winks I can live without
